meanings.definition: Relating to a technique that combines immunological and histological methods to visualize specific proteins in tissues.
meanings.sent1: The immunohistochemical staining helped identify the protein in the tissue sample.
meanings.sent2: Scientists used an immunohistochemical approach to study the proteins in the tissue.
meanings.sent3: The immunohistochemical method made the tissue look like a colorful painting.
meanings.sent4: Her mind worked like an immunohistochemical process, highlighting only the important details.
meanings.sent5: The immunohistochemical technique illuminated the hidden secrets of the tissue structure.

meanings.definition: Using antibodies to detect specific antigens in tissue samples.
meanings.sent1: The immunohistochemical revealed the presence of antigens in the tissue.
meanings.sent2: A scientist performed an immunohistochemical test to identify the antigen.
meanings.sent3: The immunohistochemical analysis of the tissue was like a detective solving a mystery.
meanings.sent4: His words acted as an immunohistochemical, pinpointing the exact location of the antigen.
meanings.sent5: The immunohistochemical process acted as a spotlight, highlighting the antigen in the tissue sample.
